query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.salePositionId = ?1 and productContract.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.reminderTime >=?1 and productContract.reminderTime <?2
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.salePositionId =?1 and productContract.companyId =?2 and productContract.payMethod = 0
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.addressId =?1 and productContract.contactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.addressId =?1 and productContract.contactPersonId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.sentAddressId =?1 and productContract.sentContactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.sentAddressId =?1 and productContract.sentContactPersonId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.sellerId =?1
SELECT OBJECT(productContract) FROM ProductContract as productContract WHERE productContract.additionalAddressId =?1
SELECT OBJECT(contractType) FROM ContractType as contractType WHERE contractType.name =?1 AND contractType.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM ContractType as c WHERE c.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Priority as s WHERE s.companyId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Status as s WHERE s.companyId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM ActionType as s WHERE s.companyId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM SalesProcess as s WHERE s.activityId=?1 and s.addressId= ?2
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM SalesProcess as s WHERE s.addressId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM SalesProcess as s WHERE s.employeeId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM SalesProcess as s WHERE s.activityId=?1
SELECT MAX(a.number) FROM Action AS a WHERE a.companyId=?1 and a.processId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Action as p WHERE p.companyId =?1 and p.actionTypeId = ?2 and p.number = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM ActionPosition as p WHERE p.processId=?1 and p.contactId= ?2 ORDER BY p.number ASC
SELECT MAX(a.number) FROM ActionPosition AS a WHERE a.processId =?1 and a.contactId =?2 and a.companyId =?3
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.processId = ?1 and sale.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.contactId = ?1 and sale.processId = ?2 and sale.companyId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.sentAddressId = ?1 and sale.sentContactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.sentAddressId = ?1 and sale.sentContactPersonId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.customerId = ?1 and sale.contactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.customerId = ?1 and sale.contactPersonId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.sellerId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(sale) FROM Sale as sale WHERE sale.additionalAddressId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(paymentStep) FROM PaymentStep as paymentStep WHERE paymentStep.contractId = ?1 and paymentStep.companyId = ?2 ORDER BY paymentStep.payStepId asc
SELECT OBJECT(ps) FROM PaymentStep as ps WHERE ps.contractId = ?1 and ps.payDate <= ?2
SELECT OBJECT(salePosition) FROM SalePosition as salePosition WHERE salePosition.saleId = ?1 and salePosition.companyId = ?2
SELECT MAX(s.deliveryDate) FROM SalePosition AS s WHERE s.saleId= ?1
SELECT OBJECT(salePosition) FROM SalePosition as salePosition WHERE salePosition.customerId = ?1 and salePosition.contactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(salePosition) FROM SalePosition as salePosition WHERE salePosition.customerId = ?1 and salePosition.contactPersonId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(salePosition) FROM SalePosition as salePosition WHERE salePosition.productId = ?1 and salePosition.contactPersonId = ?2
SELECT COUNT(s) FROM SalePosition AS s WHERE s.productId= ?1
SELECT OBJECT(actionTypeSequence) FROM ActionTypeSequence as actionTypeSequence WHERE actionTypeSequence.actionTypeId = ?1 and actionTypeSequence.companyId = ?2
